divs: Sighting Details I was a Security Guard at North Fork Resort. atapprox. 0200 I was making a check of the grounds and entered a buildinguponexiting the building I felt a strange silence and then noticed a blue pulsatinglight at eye level to my right, then a green pulsating light in front of me,then a red light to my left at which time I jumped into my vehicle and droveapprox. 100 yards away and turned to look back and there was nothing.Since thisevent I feel that these lights may have been hypnotic because myvehicle was onlyten feet away and I dont remember seeing my vehicle until after looking intothe red lightat app
